Class FileSystemMetadataProvider

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.kitesdk.data.spi.MetadataProvider
Deprecated. will be removed in 0.14.0; moved to SPI. 

@Deprecated
public class FileSystemMetadataProvider
extends org.kitesdk.data.spi.filesystem.FileSystemMetadataProvider

A MetadataProvider that stores dataset metadata in a Hadoop FileSystem.

When configured with a root directory, this implementation serializes the information within a DatasetDescriptor on the provided FileSystem. The descriptor is serialized as an Avro object and stored in a directory named after the dataset name. For example, if the dataset name is logs, the directory rootDirectory/logs/ is created if it doesn't exist, and the serialized descriptor is stored in the file descriptor.avro.
